source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_SEQ_00<tab>Gagaruna wishes you to reaffirm your desire to join the Pugilists' Guild.
target: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_SEQ_00<tab>格闘士ギルドの受付ガガルナは、ギルドへの入門手続きをするにあたって、冒険者の心を確かめようとしているようだ。

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_SEQ_01<tab>You have been referred to Hamon, the master of the Pugilists' Guild. Seek him out by the training area.
target: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_SEQ_01<tab>ガガルナから、ギルドマスター「ハモン」に入門の意思を伝えるよう言われた。格闘士ギルドの稽古場にいる「ハモン」に声をかけてみよう。

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_SEQ_02<tab>Having formally accepted you into the Pugilists' Guild, Guildmaster Hamon instructs you to go forth and slay three shrews, three hornets, and three marmots.
target: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_SEQ_02<tab>ハモンから討伐の指示を請けた。「スナッピング・シュルー」と「ヒュージ・ホーネット」、「マーモット」をそれぞれ3体倒そう

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_SEQ_03<tab>You have succeeded in slaying the specified creatures. Report back to Hamon at the Pugilists' Guild.
target: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_SEQ_03<tab>魔物を全て倒した。「格闘士ギルド」の「ハモン」に報告しよう。

source:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_SEQ_04<tab>Hamon is pleased with your showing against Thanalan's vermin population, and bids you apply yourself to your training.

※The next pugilist quest will be available from Hamon upon reaching level 5.
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_SEQ_04<tab>ハモンは、冒険者を認めてくれた。彼のような拳聖となるため、これから修行を積んでいこう。

※格闘士のレベルが5以上になると、ハモンから次の格闘士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Hamon, the master of the Pugilists' Guild.

target: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_TODO_01<tab>格闘術でマーモットを討伐
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_TODO_02<tab>格闘術でヒュージ・ホーネットを討伐
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_TODO_03<tab>格闘術でスナッピング・シュルーを討伐

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_TODO_04<tab>Report to Hamon at the Pugilists' Guild.
target: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_TODO_04<tab>格闘士ギルドのハモンに報告

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_GAGARUNA_000_1<tab>So, are you ready to present yourself for the guildmaster's inspection?
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_GAGARUNA_000_1<tab>さぁ、どうですか？
「格闘士ギルド」への入門を決意するなら、
門戸の開いている今しかありませんよ？

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_GAGARUNA_000_3<tab>Master Hamon is among the greatest pugilists of our time. For long years the man ruled the bloodsands as the <var 1A 02 /var>Holyfist<var 1A 01 /var>, though he has since retired in favor of training aspiring fighters.
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_GAGARUNA_000_3<tab>ハモン様はかつて「拳聖」と呼ばれた、凄腕の格闘士です。
現役を退いてからは、ここで若手の指導をしておられますが、
その腕は、老いた今なお健在！

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_GAGARUNA_000_5<tab>You will find him overseeing his charges yonder. Go now and show to him the fighting spirit that burns within you!
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_GAGARUNA_000_5<tab>……さあさあ、気が変わらないうちに、
奥におられるハモン様に、入門の意志をお伝えください！

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_GAGARUNA_000_10<tab>Oh? You do not wish to join us, after all? The decision is ultimately yours, but know that few would spurn the opportunity to train under Hamon Holyfist.
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_GAGARUNA_000_10<tab>そうですか……もったいない。
「拳聖」と呼ばれたハモン様の弟子となる、
数少ない機会なのですよ？

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_20<tab>Heh heh... Past time you got your arse back here. Well? What did the dancer have to say about my...<var 1A 02 /var>proposition<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_20<tab>フォッフォッフォ、遅かったのう。
踊り子の姉ちゃんに、ワシの恋文を渡してくれたかの？

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_21<tab>Eh!? Y-You're not my errand boy! There's no dancer─there never was! I'm not doing anything indecent, I swear to the gods!
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_21<tab>って……その武器は…………！
もしやお主、格闘士ギルドの入門希望かえ！？
こりゃあ嬉しいのう！！

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_23<tab>...What? You're here to enroll? Ohoho, well, why didn't you say so sooner!? In my capacity as guildmaster, I would be glad to give you a primer on the art of hand-to-hand combat!
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_23<tab>では、伝説の格闘士であるこの「拳聖のハモン」が、
お主のために、格闘術の説明をしてやろうかのう！

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_24<tab>Doubtless you already know this, but we pugilists fight with our fists and feet. While these don't deal as much damage as a blade, it hardly matters when you can land several blows for each swing of the sword. What we lack in destructive force, we more than make up for in speed and cunning. Under my guidance, not only will you master striking techniques...
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_24<tab>格闘術とは、己の鍛え抜いた四肢を使い、
軽やかに連続攻撃をたたき込む武術であるぞ。
「一撃の重さ」よりも「手数の多さ」こそ格闘の本分！

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_28<tab>You'll also learn to string them together to deliver an endless flurry of blows! Only through such fierce combinations can a pugilist realize his potential! Yaaarrrgh!
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_28<tab>格闘士ギルドに入門すれば、無限と続く連続攻撃を、
このワシから直々に教わることができるのじゃっ！
フォーッフォッフォッフォッフォッ！

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_29<tab><cough> <wheeze> Crikey, I'm spent from all this talking. You ought to speak more, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((son)) /var>─it'd give me a chance to catch my breath. But where was I?
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_29<tab>フォッフォッ……フォゴッ！　ウォッホン！
……ぜぇ……ぜぇ……久々にたくさん喋って疲れたのう。

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_30<tab>Ah, right. Joining the guild. Before you do so, I must warn you that the path of the pugilist is long and arduous. Do you believe you've got what it takes to go the distance? Be honest with yourself, now!
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_30<tab>さ、さぁ……お主に問わせてもらうぞい。
無限の連続攻撃を手に入れるために、
厳しい修行を乗り越えてゆく闘魂はあるか？

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_40<tab>Yes, you have fighting spirit─I can see it in your eyes. I see no reason to deny you a place in these halls. Welcome to the guild, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((son)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_40<tab>フォッフォッフォ！
若いもんの熱意は、ええもんじゃ。
さっそく修行をはじめちゃおうかのう！

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_43<tab>For your first lesson, I want you to test your fledgling skills against the vermin of Thanalan. Get out there and put down three marmots, three hornets, and three shrews. Return here when the deed is done.
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_43<tab>「スナッピング・シュルー」「マーモット」
そして「ヒュージ・ホーネット」を、
それぞれ3体、倒してみてきんしゃい！

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_50<tab>Eh!? You are...shockingly honest, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((son)) /var>. 'Tis truly a shame you feel unready─I happen to like frankness in my charges.
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_50<tab>し、ショック！　ハモンショックじゃ！
拳聖にショックを与えるとは、お主やるのう！！

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_60<tab>Ah, you're back, and none the worse for the exertion. Youthful vigor's a truly blessed thing!
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_60<tab>おお、帰ってきよったか。
若いもんはええのう、スタミナが有り余っておるようじゃ！

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_61<tab>You've gotten off to a fine start, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((son)) /var>. To help you on your way, I want you to have this hunting log.
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_61<tab>よし、格闘士としての一歩を踏み出した若いお主に、
この「討伐手帳」を授けようかのう！

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_62<tab>Within you'll find the names of various creatures─opponents that you might hone your skills against.
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_62<tab>「討伐手帳」には、修行に適した敵が記されておるぞ。
新しい敵にチャレンジして、己を磨くと良いじゃろう！

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_63<tab>If you want to become strong, you mustn't neglect your training. Indeed, a pugilist is only as good as the number of strikes he's dealt.
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_63<tab>敵と戦い、修行をつむことで、
お主自身のスタミナは上がっていくのじゃ。
じゃから、日々の鍛錬を大事にするんじゃよ？

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_64<tab>Get out there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and let your fists fly. When the time is ripe, I'll teach you something new.
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_64<tab>鍛錬を積み、さらなる高みに達したとき、
次の課題を与えるぞい！

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_65<tab>There's no limit to the potential of youth. I look forward to seeing you come into your own! Hah hah hah!
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_HAMON_000_65<tab>若いもんは多くの可能性を秘めておる。
お主の成長が楽しみじゃ！
フォッフォッフォッ！

source: TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_SYSTEM_000_50<tab>The next pugilist quest will be available from Hamon upon reaching level 5.
target:
TEXT_CLSPGL020_00533_SYSTEM_000_50<tab>「格闘士」のクラスクエストが開始されました。
次のクエストは「レベル5」以上で受注可能になります。
レベルを上げ、再度ギルドを訪れてください。
